hypothesis_content.title: ETH Gas Spikes Predict SOL Momentum Within 24H
hypothesis_content.statement: When Ethereum average gas price spikes above 150 gwei (7D median + 2σ) during NEUTRAL/BULL regimes, SOL/BTC ratio will increase by at least 3% within the next 24 trading hours as capital rotates to faster/cheaper L1 alternatives.
hypothesis_content.rationale: High ETH gas fees historically trigger narratives about 'ETH killers' and capital rotation to competing L1s. SOL's high throughput makes it a primary beneficiary during congestion periods.
entry_conditions: Current gas price > 7D median + 2 standard deviations

exit_conditions.take_profit: SOL/BTC ratio increases by 3.5% from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: SOL/BTC ratio decreases by 2% from entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: SOL/BTC ratio fails to show positive momentum (>1%) within 24 hours following 3 consecutive qualifying gas spikes.
